entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person who is being described as gaunter and grayer than ever before.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that are entering the dungeon.

relationships.description: Six dementors entered this time, flanking a group of four people.
A thickset man who stared blankly up at Crouch.

relationships.entity_2: woman with thick, shining dark hair and heavily hooded eyes
relationships.description: The people in the crowd turn to look up at Mr. Crouch.
The dementors placed each of the four people in the four chairs with chained arms that now stood on the dungeon floor.
A boy in his late teens, who looked nothing short of petrified. He was shivering, his straw-colored hair all over his face.
